settings.heading: Story-first product details your crews will actually read
settings.subheading: Move specs, compliance, and buying confidence into one glance-friendly layout with modular cards your team can edit without code.

settings.title: Cert-friendly storytelling
settings.text: Call out ANSI, OSHA, and heat-stress details in a dedicated card so safety managers sign off faster.

settings.title: Show how it feels to wear
settings.text: Use visual feature rows to highlight ventilation, anti-fog coatings, or weight so crews trust the fit.

settings.title: CTA that adapts to bulk
settings.text: Sticky action row keeps add-to-cart, quantity, and lead time notes together for frictionless procurement.

settings.title: Real humans on standby
settings.text: Layer in phone, chat, and distributor CTAs alongside reviews so crews know where to get help.
